name: Beat Fire
description:
Beat Fire - The Popular and Unique Music Game of 2020! Totally new with gun sounds!

EDM Music & Gun Sounds!!! Aim & Shot!!!
Once you start, you will never stop! You can not miss it!

How to play?
- Tiles fall with EDM music.
- Aim and shoot tiles.
- Let finger dances with rhythm.

Why choose Beat Fire?
- Great EDM songs! Enjoy the DJ and Hop music, relax in rhythm!
- Gun sounds remix in battlefield! Move! Beat! Bang!!!

What are you waiting for? Let's play!

----------
If you have any questions, feel free to ask us anytime at: adaricmusic@gmail.com
